column1: Thank you for requesting a quote from %store_name.

column1: If you have questions about this quote, you can email us at %store_email

column1: You can purchase this quote by submitting it to us via a manual Purchase Order or you can purchase it online:

column1: Thank you for your order from %store_name.
column2: Thank you for your order from %store_name.

column1: You can check the status of your order by logging into your account.

column1: Your order #%increment_id has been updated with a status of %order_status.
column2: Your order #%increment_id has been updated with a status of %order_status.

column1: Once your package ships we will send you a tracking number.
